sense.name: a temblor, significant tectonic activity
sense.examples: They measured the earthquake at 7.8 on the Richter scale. These cracks in the ceiling are from the last earthquake. Philip is afraid of visiting California because it has earthquakes.

sense.name: a social upheaval or disturbance
sense.examples: This new band has caused a real earthquake in the New York music scene. One earthquake followed another last week in Washington with this second scandal.
